section.title: Searching MBeans (search)
section.para: With the Jolokia search operation the agent can be queried for MBeans with a given pattern. Searching will be performed on every MBeanServer found by the agent.

section.title: GET search request
section.para: The format of the search GET URL is:
This mode is used to query for certain MBean. It takes a single argument pattern for specifying the search parameter like in http://localhost:8080/jolokia/search/*:j2eeType=J2EEServer,*
You can use patterns as described here, i.e. it may contain wildcards like * and ?. The Mbean names matching the query are returned as a list within the response.

section.title: Search response
section.para: The answer is a list of MBean names which matches the pattern or an empty list if there was no match.
The returned MBean names are properly quoted so that they can be directly used as input for other requests.
